UTL_TEXT_ADMIN

Package to maintain UTL_TEXT_TEMPLATES

Author

Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

merge_template
procedure merge_template(
p_uttm_type in varchar2,
p_uttm_name in varchar2,
p_uttm_mode in varchar2,
p_uttm_text in varchar2,
p_uttm_log_text in varchar2 default null,
p_uttm_log_severity in number default null
)

Method for merging a template into <UTL_TEXT_TEMPLATES>

Parameters
p_uttm_type
in varchar2

Type of the template

p_uttm_name
in varchar2

Name of the template

p_uttm_mode
in varchar2

Execution mode of the template

p_uttm_text
in varchar2

Template with replacement anchors

p_uttm_log_text
in varchar2

Optional template with replacement anchors for logging tasks

p_uttm_log_severity
in number

Optional severity of the log message to control the log amount

get_templates
function get_templates(
p_type in utl_text_templates.uttm_type%type,
p_name in utl_text_templates.uttm_name%type default null,
p_mode in utl_text_templates.uttm_mode%type default null
)
return utl_text_template_table pipelined

Method to retrieve all text templates for the given parameter selection

Parameters
p_type
in utl_text_templates.uttm_type%type

Type of the templates to return

p_name
in utl_text_templates.uttm_name%type

Optional Name of the templates

Returns

Row instance of table UTL_TEXT_TEMPLATES

get_template_types
function get_template_types
return utl_text_template_type_table pipelined

Method to retrieve all text templates for the given parameter selection

Parameters
p_type

Type of the templates to return

p_name

Optional Name of the templates

Returns

Row instance of table UTL_TEXT_TEMPLATES

Helper methods
open_cursor
procedure open_cursor(
p_cur out nocopy binary_integer,
p_cursor in out nocopy sys_refcursor
)

Method to open a cursor

Parameters
p_cur
out nocopy binary_integer

Cursor ID

p_cursor
in out nocopy sys_refcursor

SYS_REFCURSOR

describe_columns
procedure describe_columns(
p_cur in binary_integer,
p_cur_desc in out nocopy dbms_sql.desc_tab2,
p_clob_tab in out nocopy clob_tab,
p_template in varchar2 default null
)

Method to analyze a cursor. The following functionality is implemented:

  • analyze cursor

  • initialize PL/SQL with column_name as key an NULL as payload

  • register out variables for each column with cursor

Parameters
p_cur
in binary_integer

Cursor ID

p_cur_desc
in out nocopy dbms_sql.desc_tab2

DBMS_SQL.DESC_TAB2 with details to the actual cursor

p_clob_tab
in out nocopy clob_tab

PL/SQL table with column_name (KEY) and initial NULL value for each column

p_template
in varchar2

Optional template. If present, no template is expected to be part of the cursor

copy_row_values
procedure copy_row_values(
p_cur in binary_integer,
p_cur_desc in dbms_sql.desc_tab2,
p_clob_tab in out nocopy clob_tab
)

Method to copy row values in prepared PL/SQL table

Parameters
p_cur
in binary_integer

Cursor ID

p_cur_desc
in dbms_sql.desc_tab2

DBMS_SQL.DESC_TAB2 with details to the actual cursor

p_clob_tab
in out nocopy clob_tab

PL/SQL table with column_name (KEY) and initial NULL value for each column

copy_table_to_row_tab
procedure copy_table_to_row_tab(
p_cur in out nocopy binary_integer,
p_row_tab in out nocopy row_tab,
p_template in varchar2 default null
)

Method to copy a table into a nested PL/SQL table. Helper method as it is called three times

Parameters
p_cur
in out nocopy binary_integer

Cursor ID of a cursor that is allowed to contain multiple rows

p_row_tab
in out nocopy row_tab

PL/SQL table with the rows and column values

p_template
in varchar2

Optional template. If present, no template is expected to be part of the cursor

get_delimiter
function get_delimiter(
p_delimiter in varchar2
)
return varchar2

Method to calculate the actual delimiter sign. Allows to switch delimiter off by passing in <C_NO_DELIMITER>

Parameter
p_delimiter
in varchar2

Delimiter char. If NULL, <G_DEFAULT_DELIMITER> is used

Returns

Delimiter character

bulk_replace
procedure bulk_replace(
p_row_tab in row_tab,
p_delimiter in varchar2,
p_indent in number,
p_result out nocopy clob
)

Method to replace all anchors with respective values from P_ROW_TAB

Parameters
p_row_tab
in row_tab

Nested PL/SQL table, created by COPY_TABLE_TO_ROW_TAB

p_delimiter
in varchar2

Delimiter char to separate optional compponents within an anchor

p_indent
in number

Optional amount of blanks to indent each resulting row

p_result
out nocopy clob

CLOB instance with the converted result

bulk_replace
procedure bulk_replace(
p_row_tab in row_tab,
p_delimiter in varchar2,
p_result out nocopy clob_table
)

Method to replace all anchors with respective values from P_ROW_TAB

Paramters
p_row_tab

Nested PL/SQL table, created by COPY_TABLE_TO_ROW_TAB

p_delimiter

Delimiter char to separate optional compponents within an anchor

p_result

<CLOB_TABLE> instance with the converted result (one CLOB instance per row)

procedure initialize

Initializes the package and reads parameter values
